response.overview: The Holy Bible: Fact or fable? Bible scholars and skeptics examine four of the Bible's mysteries -- David and Goliath; Moses receiving the Ten Commandments; Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego in the fiery furnace; and the story of Samson and Delilah -- to determine if they are myth or reality. Dramatic re-creations, expert testimony and scientific experiments put these Bible stories to the test.
response.title: Bible's Greatest Miracles: The Proof
